proof.script:
("" (skosimp)
 (("" (case "BV!1 = (fill[N](FALSE) o narrow(BV!1))")
   (("1"
     (case-replace
      "bv2nat(BV!1) = bv2nat(fill[N](FALSE) o narrow(BV!1))")
     (("1" (rewrite "bv2nat_concat")
       (("1" (rewrite "bv2nat_fill_F") (("1" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
       nil)
      ("2" (assert) nil nil))
     nil)
    ("2" (hide 2)
     (("2" (lemma "N_size")
       (("2" (assert)
         (("2" (use "bv2nat_upperbound[2*N]")
           (("2" (apply-extensionality :hide? t)
             (("2" (grind) nil nil)) nil))
           nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skosimp)
 (("" (lemma "bv2nat_iterate[2 * N]")
   (("" (inst - "BV1!1" "bv2nat(BV2!1)")
     (("" (rewrite "times_rec_iterate")
       (("" (assert)
         (("" (hide 2)
           (("" (lemma "exp2_sum")
             (("" (inst - "N" "N")
               (("" (assert)
                 (("" (replace -1)
                   (("" (use "lt_times_lt_pos1")
                     (("" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
                   nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skosimp)
 (("" (expand "*")
   (("" (rewrite "times_rec_iterate")
     (("" (rewrite "bv2nat_iterate[2 * N]") (("" (assert) nil nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (lemma "N_size")
 (("" (skosimp)
   (("" (assert)
     ((""
       (case "bv2int(BV2!1) = IF bv2nat(BV2!1) < exp2(2 * N - 1) THEN bv2nat(BV2!1) ELSE bv2nat(BV2!1) - exp2(2 * N) ENDIF")
       (("1" (lift-if)
         (("1" (ground)
           (("1" (replace -2)
             (("1" (expand "*")
               (("1" (rewrite "times_rec_iterate")
                 (("1" (rewrite "bv2int_iterate[2 * N]")
                   (("1" (assert) nil nil)) nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil)
            ("2" (lemma "bv2int_iterate[2 * N]")
             (("2" (inst - "BV1!1" "exp2(2 * N) - bv2nat(BV2!1)")
               (("2" (assert)
                 (("2" (use "times_min_second[2 * N]")
                   (("2" (lemma "bv_double_neg[2 * N]")
                     (("2" (inst - "BV1!1 * BV2!1")
                       (("2" (replace -1 2 rl)
                         (("2" (replace -2 2 rl)
                           (("2" (hide -1 -2)
                             (("2" (rewrite "bv2int_neg")
                               (("2"
                                 (assert)
                                 (("2"
                                   (expand* "minint" "*")
                                   (("2"
                                     (rewrite "times_rec_iterate")
                                     (("2"
                                       (rewrite
                                        "bv2nat_minus_bv[2 * N]")
                                       (("2" (assert) nil nil))
                                       nil))
                                     nil))
                                   nil))
                                 nil))
                               nil))
                             nil))
                           nil))
                         nil))
                       nil))
                     nil))
                   nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil))
         nil)
        ("2" (expand "bv2int") (("2" (propax) nil nil)) nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem!)
 (("" (use "bv2int_times")
   (("" (assert)
     (("" (rewrite "bv2int_widen")
       (("" (rewrite "bv2int_widen")
         (("" (assert)
           (("" (hide 2)
             (("" (typepred "bv2int[N](bv1!1)")
               (("" (typepred "bv2int[N](bv2!1)")
                 (("" (expand* "minint" "maxint")
                   (("" (assert)
                     (("" (lemma "exp2_sum")
                       (("" (inst - "N - 1" "N - 1")
                         (("" (assert)
                           (("" (expand "exp2" +)
                             (("" (replace -1)
                               ((""
                                 (hide -1)
                                 ((""
                                   (assert)
                                   ((""
                                     (case-replace
                                      "bv2int[N](bv1!1) = 0")
                                     (("1" (assert) nil nil)
                                      ("2"
                                       (case-replace
                                        "bv2int[N](bv2!1) = 0")
                                       (("1" (assert) nil nil)
                                        ("2"
                                         (case "bv2int(bv1!1) > 0")
                                         (("1"
                                           (case "bv2int(bv2!1) > 0")
                                           (("1"
                                             (assert)
                                             (("1"
                                               (lemma
                                                "lt_times_lt_pos1")
                                               (("1"
                                                 (inst
                                                  -
                                                  "bv2int(bv1!1)"
                                                  "bv2int(bv2!1)"
                                                  "exp2(N - 1)"
                                                  "exp2(N - 1)")
                                                 (("1"
                                                   (lemma
                                                    "pos_times_lt")
                                                   (("1"
                                                     (inst
                                                      -
                                                      "bv2int(bv1!1)"
                                                      "bv2int(bv2!1)")
                                                     (("1"
                                                       (assert)
                                                       nil
                                                       nil))
                                                     nil))
                                                   nil))
                                                 nil))
                                               nil))
                                             nil)
                                            ("2"
                                             (lemma "neg_times_lt")
                                             (("2"
                                               (inst
                                                -
                                                "bv2int(bv1!1)"
                                                "bv2int(bv2!1)")
                                               (("2"
                                                 (assert)
                                                 (("2"
                                                   (lemma
                                                    "lt_times_lt_neg1")
                                                   (("2"
                                                     (inst-cp
                                                      -
                                                      "bv2int[N](bv2!1)"
                                                      "-bv2int[N](bv1!1)"
                                                      "-exp2(N - 1)"
                                                      "-exp2(N - 1)")
                                                     (("2"
                                                       (assert)
                                                       (("2"
                                                         (inst
                                                          -

                                                          "-exp2(N - 1)"
                                                          "-exp2(N - 1)"
                                                          "-exp2(N - 1)")
                                                         (("2"
                                                           (assert)
                                                           nil
                                                           nil))
                                                         nil))
                                                       nil))
                                                     nil))
                                                   nil))
                                                 nil))
                                               nil))
                                             nil))
                                           nil)
                                          ("2"
                                           (case "bv2int(bv2!1) > 0")
                                           (("1"
                                             (lemma "neg_times_lt")
                                             (("1"
                                               (inst
                                                -
                                                "bv2int[N](bv2!1)"
                                                "bv2int[N](bv1!1)")
                                               (("1"
                                                 (assert)
                                                 (("1"
                                                   (lemma
                                                    "lt_times_lt_neg1")
                                                   (("1"
                                                     (inst
                                                      -
                                                      "-bv2int[N](bv2!1)"

                                                      "-exp2(N - 1)"

                                                     (("1"

                                                       nil
                                                       nil))
                                                     nil))
                                                   nil))
                                                 nil))
                                               nil))
                                             nil)
                                            ("2"
                                             (use "pos_times_lt")
                                             (("2"
                                               (assert)
                                               (("2"
                                                 (lemma
                                                  "lt_times_lt_neg1")
                                                 (("2"
                                                   (inst-cp
                                                    -
                                                    "bv2int[N](bv1!1)"
                                                    "bv2int[N](bv2!1)"
                                                    "-exp2(N - 1)"
                                                    "-exp2(N - 1)")
                                                   (("2"
                                                     (assert)
                                                     (("2"
                                                       (inst
                                                        -
                                                        "bv2int[N](bv2!1)"
                                                        "bv2int[N](bv1!1)"
                                                        "-exp2(N - 1)"
                                                        "-exp2(N - 1)")
                                                       (("2"

                                                 nil))
                                               nil))

("" (induct "n")
 (("1" (skolem!)
   (("1" (expand "iterate") (("1" (grind-with-ext) nil nil)) nil)) nil)
  ("2" (skosimp*)
   (("2" (expand "iterate" +)
     (("2" (rewrite "narrow_plus")
       (("2" (inst?) (("2" (assert) nil nil)) nil)) nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (skolem!)
 (("" (expand "bv2nat")
   ((""
     (case "FORALL (n: nat): n <= 2 * N IMPLIES bv2nat_rec(n, BV!1) = exp2(N) * (IF n >= N THEN bv2nat_rec(n - N, BV!1 ^ (2 * N - 1, N)) ELSE 0 ENDIF) + bv2nat_rec(IF n < N THEN n ELSE N ENDIF, BV!1 ^ (N - 1, 0))")
     (("1" (inst - "2 * N") (("1" (assert) nil nil)) nil)
      ("2" (hide 2)
       (("2" (induct "n")
         (("1" (grind) nil nil)
          ("2" (skosimp)
           (("2" (case "1 + j!1 < N")
             (("1" (assert)
               (("1" (expand "bv2nat_rec" +)
                 (("1" (replace*) (("1" (grind) nil nil)) nil)) nil))
               nil)
              ("2" (case-replace "j!1 = N - 1")
               (("1" (assert)
                 (("1" (expand "bv2nat_rec" +)
                   (("1" (replace*) (("1" (grind) nil nil)) nil)) nil))
                 nil)
                ("2" (assert)
                 (("2" (expand "bv2nat_rec" 3 3)
                   (("2" (expand "bv2nat_rec" 3 1)
                     (("2" (assert)
                       (("2" (replace*)
                         (("2" (hide -1)
                           (("2"
                             (case-replace
                              "exp2(j!1) * b2n(BV!1 ^ j!1) = b2n(BV!1 ^ (2 * N - 1, N) ^ (j!1 - N)) * exp2(j!1 - N) * exp2(N)")
                             (("2" (hide 4)
                               (("2"
                                 (expand* "b2n" "^")
                                 (("2"
                                   (lemma "exp2_sum")
                                   (("2"
                                     (inst - "N" "j!1 - N")
                                     (("2" (reduce) nil nil))
                                     nil))
                                   nil))
                                 nil))
                               nil))
                             nil))
                           nil))
                         nil))
                       nil))
                     nil))
                   nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil)
          ("3" (reduce) nil nil) ("4" (reduce) nil nil)
          ("5" (reduce) nil nil) ("6" (reduce) nil nil)
          ("7" (reduce) nil nil) ("8" (reduce) nil nil))
         nil))
       nil)
      ("3" (reduce) nil nil) ("4" (reduce) nil nil)
      ("5" (reduce) nil nil) ("6" (reduce) nil nil)
      ("7" (reduce) nil nil) ("8" (reduce) nil nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)

("" (lemma "N_size")
 (("" (skolem!)
   (("" (expand "*")
     (("" (rewrite "times_rec_iterate[N]")
       (("" (rewrite "times_rec_iterate[2 * N]")
         (("" (rewrite "narrow_iterate")
           (("" (rewrite "bv2nat_split")
             (("" (use "iterate_add[bvec[N]]")
               (("" (replace -1 1 rl)
                 (("" (hide -1)
                   (("" (expand "o")
                     (("" (lemma "iterate_modulo[N]")
                       ((""
                         (inst - "narrow(BV1!1)"
                          "bv2nat(BV2!1 ^ (2 * N - 1, N))")
                         (("" (expand "narrow") (("" (assert) nil nil))
                           nil))
                         nil))
                       nil))
                     nil))
                   nil))
                 nil))
               nil))
             nil))
           nil))
         nil))
       nil))
     nil))
   nil))
 nil)
